prompt.0: Please translate the following text from German to English. Do not ask any questions or give any reasons, just provide the translation. Examples: German = "Apfel" to English = "Apple", German = "Auto" to English = "Car", German = "Haus" to English = "House", German = "Wasser" to English = "Water", German = "Himmel" to English = "Sky". Here is the text: "Die rund 1.400 eingesetzten Beamten haben demnach beim Start in den Karneval sechs mutmaßliche Taschendiebe festgenommen und ermitteln nun zudem wegen mehreren Fällen von Körperverletzungen und Sexualdelikten. Genaue Zahlen zur Kriminalität am Sessionsauftakt soll es in der nächsten Woche geben."

source_text.0: Die rund 1.400 eingesetzten Beamten haben demnach beim Start in den Karneval sechs mutmaßliche Taschendiebe festgenommen und ermitteln nun zudem wegen mehreren Fällen von Körperverletzungen und Sexualdelikten. Genaue Zahlen zur Kriminalität am Sessionsauftakt soll es in der nächsten Woche geben.

hypothesis.0:
(Note: the text appears to be from a news article, specifically from a German news website or newspaper.) 

English translation: 
"The approximately 1,400 personnel deployed have thus, at the start of the Carnival, six suspected thieves caught and are now investigating in addition to several cases of bodily injury and sexual offenses."

reference_text.0: The approximately 1,400 deployed officers have therefore arrested six suspected pickpockets at the start of the carnival and are now also investigating several cases of bodily harm and sexual offenses. Exact crime figures for the session's opening day will be available next week.
